vlc.build_command: sudo dnf builddep vlc && ./bootstrap && ./configure --prefix=/usr/local && make -j$(nproc) && sudo make install && sudo ldconfig

firefox.build_command:
./mach bootstrap > /dev/null && echo 'ac_add_options --enable-application=browser
ac_add_options --enable-release
ac_add_options --enable-optimize
ac_add_options --disable-debug
mk_add_options MOZ_OBJDIR=@TOPSRCDIR@/obj-ff-release' > .mozconfig && ./mach build faster && sudo ./mach install
